verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Worthy of praise! Worthy of Praise!
Lord,
You are worthy of praise!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: My heart overflows with praise to the Lord.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: I will lift up my voice to the King.

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: He brought me out of the pit of despair,

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: And taught my heart to sing.
